concept.title: Add your dependencies to the build.gradle file

conbody.p: Once your dependencies are available on Maven Central Repository, you can add them to the build.gradle file. You can refer to the build.gradle file in our sample project here on GitHub: Zip custom keywords plugin.
To open the build.gradle file in Katalon Studio, do as follows:

li.p: Go to File > New > Project, check the Generate build.gradle file box
Katalon Studio will generate a default build.gradle template.

conbody.p: By doing this, your dependencies are repackaged to avoid conflicts with other plugins.
